Evidence Of Metalners?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Storyline Topics: Evidence Of Metalners?
By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, October 31, 2001 - 04:49 pm:

I think I saw evidence of Metalners! (Not as playable monsters, just that they had visited.) If you go to an unofficial tourney in the Kalaragi area, and when the battle grid comes up just let the camera wander around without clicking on anything, you will see parts of what was once a big statue, head/hands/feet. You will also see two arches. As the camera pans around, after a while you will see the top of one of them close up, and, to me, it really looks like a Metalners with both palms raised is carved into it.

By Lisa Shock on Wednesday, October 31, 2001 - 08:42 pm:

It's a monster from MR2, an alien from outer space that looks like a metal spaceship. Whtjunior.com has pics if you look in his games section for MR2.
